alert.note: Alert for Leake; Madison (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 18 at 9:59PM CDT until June 18 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1100 PM CDT FOR WESTERN LEAKE...NORTHWESTERN SCOTT AND NORTHEASTERN MADISON COUNTIES... At 959 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Camden, or 13 miles northeast of Canton, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Camden around 1005 PM CDT. Farmhaven around 1010 PM CDT. Carthage and Redwater around 1040 PM CDT. Tuscola around 1045 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for central Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
